title: Not The Seasoning He Asked For: Ahmedabad Man Finds Insect On The Domino's Pizza He Ordered
text:
Not The Seasoning He Asked For: Ahmedabad Man Finds Insect On The Domino's Pizza He Ordered

Not The Seasoning He Asked For: Ahmedabad Man Finds Insect On The Domino's Pizza He Ordered

No food outlet seems to be a 100% innocent when it comes to hygiene. Not the best restaurants in CP and not even Domino’s. Years ago, Domino’s received a lot of flak when insects were found crawling inside one of its oregano packets.

For sometime, domino’s stopped giving oregano’s packets at all (yes, authorities did not shut the place down, they just fooled people into believing that they were ‘testing’ stuff). Two years later, Domino’s Pizza is receiving criticism again. This time, after an insect was found in a pizza in one of its outlets in Sattadhar area, Ahmedabad, Gujarat.

Ahemdabad Mirror/Eurupics

The outlet was reportedly sealed afterwards by health department officials of Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation. The order was reportedly placed at the pizza outlet in Kalasagar Mall in Sattadhar area.

The buyer recorded the disgusting incident on the phone. After finding out about it, AMC immediately shut the outlet. Reportedly, when the police tried to find the exact address of the customer, they were unable to trace it.

The health department officials in the city seem to be cracking down actively on restaurant and food outlets that are lousy with hygiene. Notices have reportedly been issued to to places like Shambhu Coffee Bar, Faasos, Jay Bhavani Vadapav, Karnavati Dabeli, Dangee Dums, Saurashtra Ganthia among others.

Well, no one wants dead insects for seasoning, right?
